verses.verse: I am <S%G3004>telling<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> I am not <S%G5574>lying,<s%> my <S%G4893>conscience<s%> <S%G4828>bearing<s%> me <S%G4828>witness<s%> in the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%>
that I have <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3077>sorrow<s%> and <S%G88>unceasing<s%> <S%G3601>grief<s%> in my <S%G2588>heart.<s%>

For I could <S%G2172>wish<s%> that I <S%G846>myself<s%> were <S%G331>accursed,<s%> [separated] from <S%G5547>Christ<s%> for the <S%G5228>sake<s%> of my <S%G80>brethren,<s%> my <S%G4773>kinsmen<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%>

<S%G3748>who<s%> are <S%G2475>Israelites,<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> belongs the <S%G5206>adoption<s%> as <S%G5206>sons<s%> and the <S%G1391>glory<s%> and the <S%G1242>covenants<s%> and the <S%G3548>giving<s%> of the <S%G3548>Law<s%> and the [temple] <S%G2999>service<s%> and the <S%G1860>promises,<s%>

<S%G3739>whose<s%> are the <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> and from <S%G3739>whom<s%> is the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> who is <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2128>blessed<s%> <S%G165>forever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

But [it is] not as <S%G3754>though<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1601>failed.<s%> For they are not <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2274>Israel<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> are [descended] from <S%G2274>Israel;<s%>

<S%G3761>neither<s%> are they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they are Abraham's <S%G4690>descendants,<s%> but: <S%G1722>"through<s%> <S%G2464>Isaac<s%> your <S%G4690>descendants<s%> will be <S%G2564>named.<s%>"

That is, it is not the <S%G5043>children<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G3778>who<s%> are <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> but the <S%G5043>children<s%> of the <S%G1860>promise<s%> are <S%G3049>regarded<s%> as <S%G4690>descendants.<s%>
For <S%G3778>this<s%> is a <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G1860>promise:<s%> "At <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> I will <S%G2064>come,<s%> and <S%G4564>Sarah<s%> shall have a <S%G5207>son.<s%>"

And not <S%G3440>only<s%> this, but there was <S%G4479>Rebekah<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> when she had <S%G2845>conceived<s%> <S%G2192><s%> [twins] by <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1520>man,<s%> our <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2464>Isaac;<s%>

for though [the twins] were not <S%G3380>yet<s%> <S%G1080>born,<s%> and had not <S%G4238>done<s%> <S%G5100>anything<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5337>bad,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that God's <S%G4286>purpose<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to [His] <S%G1589>choice<s%> might <S%G3306>stand,<s%> not <S%G1537>because<s%> of <S%G2041>works,<s%> but <S%G1537>because<s%> of Him who <S%G2564>calls,<s%>
it was <S%G3004>said<s%> to her, "The <S%G3173>older<s%> will <S%G1398>serve<s%> the <S%G1640>younger.<s%>"
<S%G2509>Just<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G2384>"Jacob<s%> I <S%G25>loved,<s%> but <S%G2269>Esau<s%> I <S%G3404>hated.<s%>"
<S%G5101>What<s%> shall we <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%>? There is <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G93>injustice<s%> with <S%G2316>God,<s%> is there? May it <S%G3361>never<s%> be!

For He <S%G3004>says<s%> to <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> "I will <S%G1653>have<s%> <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G1653>have<s%> <S%G1653>mercy,<s%> and I will <S%G3627>have<s%> <S%G3627>compassion<s%> on <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G3627>have<s%> <S%G3627>compassion.<s%>"

<S%G686>So<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> it [does] not [depend] on the man who <S%G2309>wills<s%> <S%G3761>or<s%> the man who <S%G5143>runs,<s%> but on <S%G2316>God<s%> who <S%G1653>has<s%> <S%G1653>mercy.<s%>

For the <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> to <S%G5328>Pharaoh,<s%> "For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G846>very<s%> purpose I <S%G1825>raised<s%> you up, to <S%G1731>demonstrate<s%> My <S%G1411>power<s%> in you, and that My <S%G3686>name<s%> might be <S%G1229>proclaimed<s%> <S%G1722>throughout<s%> the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G1093>earth.<s%>"
<S%G686>So<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> He <S%G1653>has<s%> <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on <S%G3739>whom<s%> He <S%G2309>desires,<s%> and He <S%G4645>hardens<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> He <S%G2309>desires.<s%>
You will <S%G3004>say<s%> to me <S%G3767>then,<s%> <S%G5101>"Why<s%> does He <S%G2089>still<s%> <S%G3201>find<s%> <S%G3201>fault<s%>? For <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G436>resists<s%> His <S%G1013>will<s%>?"

On the <S%G3304>contrary,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> are you, <S%G5599>O<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> who <S%G470>answers<s%> <S%G470>back<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%>? The <S%G4110>thing<s%> <S%G4110>molded<s%> will not <S%G3004>say<s%> to the <S%G4111>molder,<s%> <S%G5101>"Why<s%> did you <S%G4160>make<s%> me <S%G3779>like<s%> <S%G3779>this,<s%>" will it?

<S%G2228>Or<s%> does not the <S%G2763>potter<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G1849>right<s%> over the <S%G4081>clay,<s%> to <S%G4160>make<s%> from the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5445>lump<s%> <S%G3739>one<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G4632>vessel<s%> for <S%G5092>honorable<s%> <S%G5092>use,<s%> and <S%G3739>another<s%> <S%G1161><s%> for <S%G819>common<s%> <S%G819>use<s%>?

<S%G1161>What<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> although <S%G2309>willing<s%> to <S%G1731>demonstrate<s%> His <S%G3709>wrath<s%> and to <S%G1107>make<s%> His <S%G1415>power<s%> <S%G1107>known,<s%> <S%G5342>endured<s%> with <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3115>patience<s%> <S%G4632>vessels<s%> of <S%G3709>wrath<s%> <S%G2675>prepared<s%> for <S%G684>destruction<s%>?

And [He did so] in <S%G2443>order<s%> that He might <S%G1107>make<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> the <S%G4149>riches<s%> of His <S%G1391>glory<s%> upon <S%G4632>vessels<s%> of <S%G1656>mercy,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> He <S%G4282>prepared<s%> <S%G4282>beforehand<s%> for <S%G1391>glory,<s%>

[even] us, <S%G3739>whom<s%> He <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2564>called,<s%> not from <S%G1537>among<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> from <S%G1537>among<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles.<s%>

As He <S%G3004>says<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> in <S%G5617>Hosea,<s%> "I will <S%G2564>call<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who were not My <S%G2992>people,<s%> 'My <S%G2992>people,<s%>' And her who was not <S%G25>beloved,<s%> <S%G25>'beloved.<s%>'"

"And it shall be that in the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> it was <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, 'you are not My <S%G2992>people,<s%>' <S%G1563>There<s%> they shall be <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>"

And <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> <S%G2896>cries<s%> out <S%G5228>concerning<s%> <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> <S%G1437>"Though<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2274>Israel<s%> be as the <S%G285>sand<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> it is the <S%G5275>remnant<s%> that will be <S%G4982>saved;<s%>
for the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> will <S%G4160>execute<s%> His <S%G3056>word<s%> upon the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G4931>thoroughly<s%> and <S%G4932>quickly.<s%> "

And <S%G2531>just<s%> as <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> <S%G4275>foretold,<s%> <S%G1508>"Except<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G4519>Sabaoth<s%> had <S%G1459>left<s%> to us a <S%G4690>posterity,<s%> We would have <S%G1096>become<s%> as <S%G4670>Sodom,<s%> and would have <S%G3666>resembled<s%> <S%G1116>Gomorrah.<s%>"

<S%G5101>What<s%> shall we <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%>? That <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> who did not <S%G1377>pursue<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G2638>attained<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G1161>even<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> which is by <S%G4102>faith;<s%>
but <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> <S%G1377>pursuing<s%> a <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> did not <S%G5348>arrive<s%> at [that] <S%G3551>law.<s%>

<S%G1223>Why<s%> <S%G5101><s%>? <S%G3754>Because<s%> [they did] not [pursue it] by <S%G4102>faith,<s%> but as <S%G5613>though<s%> [it were] by <S%G2041>works.<s%> They <S%G4350>stumbled<s%> <S%G4350>over<s%> the <S%G4348>stumbling<s%> <S%G3037>stone,<s%>

<S%G2531>just<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> I <S%G5087>lay<s%> in <S%G4622>Zion<s%> a <S%G3037>stone<s%> of <S%G4348>stumbling<s%> and a <S%G4073>rock<s%> of <S%G4625>offense,<s%> And he who <S%G4100>believes<s%> in Him will not be <S%G2617>disappointed.<s%>"
